item.description:
Join us this Friday night for drinks and dancing, starting off at the Asgard bar, followed by one of the best venues in Boston, Middlesex Lounge!  This venue plays great music and remains as popular as ever.  I expect a solid turnout, so come and add some spice to your winter!

This evening promises to be a great opportunity to meet new friends and get your groove on!  We will start off at the Asgard bar at 8pm, and then walk over to Middlesex Lounge by 10pm. This lounge does get VERY busy as the night progresses, so I encourage you to come EARLY.  All group members are welcome, and feel free to bring a friend or two!

DETAILS: We will meet at 8pm at the Asgard bar (350 Mass. Ave, Central Square).  We will either gather at the bar, or at one of the tables.  Give me a ring when you get there (646.541.0708).  We'll head to Middlesex Lounge around 9:30pm to avoid the lines (the lounge is across the street at 315 Mass. Ave.)  Please come early so you have time to meet poeple!  Cover: None for Asgard, $5 for Middlesex Lounge.

FIND THE ORGANIZER: My picture is located on the left-hand side of the site. For help/questions, call my cell: 646.541.0708. Please dress appropriately.  If traveling by T, Central Square is the closest.  See you there!

Charlie

*The Organizer reserves the right to adjust RSVPs in order to balance out group turnout.*
item.how_to_find_us: Look for me at the venue - or call my cell phone.

group.name: The Boston Night Life Meetup Group

item.name: Boston Nightlife at Middlesex Lounge, Going Dancing Friday Night!
